form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, 4-131 ( (Rev. 3-1-74)

full_text: UNITEDSE by NAPAME18/2023JUSTICE Form approved. Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No 43-R0052.
